incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays to T-Mobile Network in US over Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to T-Mobile network in US over subset of short codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 August 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 15 August 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada

Impacted Products:
Lookup SIM Swap
Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 19 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and failures to and from Twilio Japan phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 21 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT

22 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT
22 August 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 09:00 PDT
